scripts.test:chrome:headless: set BROWSER=chrome_headless && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: set BROWSER=firefox && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox:headless: set BROWSER=firefox_headless && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:safari: set BROWSER=safari && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:all: set BROWSER=all && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:all:headless: set BROWSER=all_headless && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:retry: set RETRY=3 && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:parallel: set MAX_INSTANCES=3 && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:full: set BROWSER=chrome && set RETRY=3 && set MAX_INSTANCES=3 && npx wdio run src/config/wdio.conf.js
